# Superlines

> Superlines is an AI Search Visibility platform that monitors and optimizes how brands appear in AI-powered search results across ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, Claude, Grok, Mistral, and DeepSeek.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](https://docs.superlines.io/getting-started/introduction): What Superlines does, who it's for, and which AI platforms are supported.
- [Quick Start](https://docs.superlines.io/getting-started/quickstart): Set up your first brand and start tracking AI search visibility in 5 minutes.
- [Core Concepts](https://docs.superlines.io/getting-started/concepts): Account hierarchy, prompts, responses, citations, fan-out queries, and how the analysis works.

## Account Management

- [Organizations](https://docs.superlines.io/account/organizations): Organization settings, subscription plans, LLM engine configuration, and API key management.
- [Brands & Domains](https://docs.superlines.io/account/brands): Creating brands, market configuration (country, language), competitor mappings, and automatic prompt generation.
- [Prompt Management](https://docs.superlines.io/account/prompts): Adding prompts (manual, bulk import, auto-generated), labels, quotas, statuses, signals, and where to find prompts/citations/responses.
- [Team & Roles](https://docs.superlines.io/account/team): Inviting members, role-based access control (Owner, Admin, Member), domain-scoped access, and seat limits.

## Metrics & Data

- [Key Metrics](https://docs.superlines.io/metrics/key-metrics): Brand Visibility, Share of Voice (SOV), Citation Rate, Share of Citations, Mentions, Sentiment Score, and online vs. offline metrics.
- [Understanding Responses](https://docs.superlines.io/metrics/responses): How responses are collected, brand detection, response metrics per prompt, and why numbers fluctuate early on.
- [Citations & Fan-out Queries](https://docs.superlines.io/metrics/citations): What citations are, which engines provide them, domain-level vs. URL-level tracking, fan-out queries, and content/technical strategies for improving citations.
- [Analysis Process](https://docs.superlines.io/metrics/analysis-process): Daily analysis cycle, data availability timelines, metric aggregation levels, trend detection, and data retention.

## MCP Server

- [MCP Overview](https://docs.superlines.io/mcp/overview): What the MCP server does, example prompts, available tool categories, and requirements.
- [MCP Setup Guide](https://docs.superlines.io/mcp/setup): Step-by-step setup for Claude Desktop, Cursor, and VS Code using SSE or npx.
- [Available Tools](https://docs.superlines.io/mcp/tools): Complete reference of all 26 MCP tools — brand management, core metrics, webpage analysis, competitive analysis, advanced analytics, strategic tools, and SEO tools.

## REST API

- [Authentication](https://docs.superlines.io/api/authentication): Bearer token authentication with API keys, OAuth access tokens, or Firebase ID tokens. Security best practices.
- [API Endpoints](https://docs.superlines.io/api/endpoints): Metrics, citations, brand mentions, prompts, weekly performance, competitors, content opportunities, and dashboard insights endpoints with parameters and response formats.

## Integrations

- [Looker Studio](https://docs.superlines.io/integrations/looker-studio): Connect Superlines data to Google Looker Studio for custom dashboards and automated reports.

## FAQ

- [Frequently Asked Questions](https://docs.superlines.io/faq): Exporting reports, prompt discovery, data sources, plan upgrades, historical data, initial number fluctuations, Brand Visibility vs. Share of Voice, brand limits, and cookie/GDPR requirements.

## Key Definitions

- **Brand Visibility**: Percentage of AI responses that mention your brand. Formula: (Responses mentioning brand / Total responses) × 100.
- **Share of Voice (SOV)**: Your brand mentions as a percentage of all brand mentions (yours + competitors). Formula: (Your mentions / All brand mentions) × 100.
- **Citation Rate**: Percentage of AI responses that cite (link to) your website. Formula: (Responses citing website / Total responses) × 100.
- **Prompt**: A question or query that people type into AI assistants, tracked by Superlines across multiple AI engines.
- **Citation**: A reference to a specific URL in an AI response — a strong signal of content authority.
- **Fan-out Query**: A web search that an AI engine performs behind the scenes when answering a question with web access.
- **Response**: The full text answer that an AI engine gives to a tracked prompt, analyzed for brand mentions, citations, and sentiment.
- **MCP (Model Context Protocol)**: An open standard that lets AI assistants interact with external tools and data sources.

## Supported AI Engines

ChatGPT, Microsoft Copilot, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, Google Gemini, xAI Grok, Anthropic Claude, Mistral AI, DeepSeek.

## Links

- Website: https://superlines.io
- Dashboard: https://analytics.superlines.io
- MCP NPM Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@superlines/mcp-server
- Support: support@superlines.io
